name: Lost And Found (MoltenMoustache)
description:
This game  was created in 48 hours for the Australian Global Game Jam of 2021. This years theme was Lost and Found.

You're volunteering at a hospital and your job is to run the Lost and Found booth, returning the lost items of patients who come asking. Make sure to double check before you give away items! 

Lost And Found is played purely through mouse input, left click and drag items around, right click to examine an item closer.
